LanguageData.FM.HelpMessage:
Bienvenido a Colony Manager V2!

Colony Manager te permite escoger los objetivos para la producción, caza, tala y recolección. Cada uno de estos, puede ser configurado a través de varias pantallas de gestión, y accede haciendo uso de los botones de la parte superiror de la pantalla, así como otras pantallas útiles. n
Cuando se escoge un objetivo, un peon con el gestor de trabajos activo revisará ocasionalmente sus objetivos y las reservas de la colonia en la mesa de gestión, y actualizará las recetas y asignaciones teniendo esto en cuenta.

Para lograr que el mod funcione, necesitaras dos cosas:
 -Un peon con el gestor de trabajos activo.
 - Una mesa de gestión. 

¡Feliz caza!
LanguageData.FM.AlertNoTableLabel: Es necesaria una mesa de gestión
LanguageData.FM.AlertNoTable: Los objetivos de gestión han sido establecidos, pero no existe una mesa de gestión disponible
LanguageData.FM.AlertNoManager: Los objetivos de gestión han sido establecidos, pero ningún peon tienela gestión de trabajos activa
LanguageData.FM.LastUpdateTooltip: Este trabajo fue actualizado hace {0}, y es programado para ser actualizado cada {1}.\n\nHaz click para cambiar el intervalo.
LanguageData.FM.CheckReachability: Comprobar si el objetivo es alcanzable
LanguageData.FM.CheckReachability.Tip: Calculate if a path to the target exists (for any pawn) before creating a designation.
LanguageData.FM.Expensive.Tip: Enabling this setting may decrease performance, particularly on large maps, mountainous maps, jobs with many potential targets, and colonies with high numbers of colonists.
LanguageData.FM.PathBasedDistance: Calculate distance based on actual path
LanguageData.FM.PathBasedDistance.Tip: If enabled, distances will be calculated based on real paths. If disabled, distances will be calculated 'as the crow flies'. \n\nNOTE: Enabling this option on jobs with a large amount of possible targets may lead to significant lag spikes.
LanguageData.FM.CountAllOnMap: Contar todos los existentes en el mapa
LanguageData.FM.CountAllOnMap.Tip: If enabled, counts all items allowed by the threshold filter on the map. If disabled, counts only those in stockpiles and storage buildings.
LanguageData.FM.HistoryClickToEnable:
Click a {0} {1} en el gráfico.
Click derecho para mostrar solo {1}.
LanguageData.FME.PeriodShownTooltip: Currently showing power production and consumption for the last {0}.\n\nClick to change the period.
LanguageData.FME.NotResearched: Power management has not been researched
LanguageData.FM.JobCompletedTooltip: Job threshold has been reached.\n\nClick to suspend this job.
LanguageData.FM.UnsuspendJobTooltip: Job has been suspended.\n\nClick to unsuspend.
LanguageData.FM.ConfirmOverwrite: {0} exists.\n\nAre you sure you want to overwrite?
LanguageData.FMH.AllowHumanMeat.Tip: Should human meat be counted? \n\nNOTE: This is a shortcut for toggling humanoid meats in the threshold filter. You can set more options in the threshold details.
LanguageData.FMH.AllowInsectMeat.Tip: Should insect meat be counted? \n\nNOTE: This is a shortcut for toggling insect meat in the threshold filter. You can set more options in the threshold details.
LanguageData.FMH.UnforbidCorpses.Tip: Automatically unforbid (fresh) corpses of animal types set to be hunted.
LanguageData.FMH.TargetCountTooltip:
Objetivo: {3}
{0} en almacén
{1} esperado de la carnicería
{2} esperado de la asignación actual.
LanguageData.FMF.ClearWindCells.Tip: Clear all cells that are in wind turbines' catchment area
LanguageData.FMF.AllowSaplings.Tip: Should forestry be limited to fully mature trees only?
LanguageData.FMF.TargetCountTooltip: Objetivo: {2}\n{0} in storage\n{1} expected from current designations.
LanguageData.FMF.JobType.ClearArea.Tip: Clearing areas to keep wind turbines running smoothly, and deny enemies any possible cover in the killing fields
LanguageData.FMF.ProvidesCover.Tip: Select all plants that provide cover
LanguageData.FMF.BlocksWind.Tip: Select all plants that block wind
LanguageData.FMG.TargetCountTooltip: Objetivo: {2}\n{0} in storage\n{1} expected from current designations.
LanguageData.FMG.ForceMature.Tip: Should foraging be limited to fully mature plants only?
LanguageData.FM.Foraging.SyncFilterAndAllowed.Tip: Enabling this will try to synchronize the counted materials in the threshold filter with the plants allowed for foraging, and vice versa.
LanguageData.FML.RestrictToArea.Tip: Restrict animals to a specific area, optionally separated by gender and lifestage
LanguageData.FML.ButcherExcess.Tip: Should excess livestock be butchered for meat?
LanguageData.FML.ButcherTrained.Tip: Are trained animals allowed to be butchered?
LanguageData.FML.ButcherPregnant.Tip: Are pregnant animals allowed to be butchered?
LanguageData.FML.ButcherBonded.Tip: Are bonded animals allowed to be butchered?
LanguageData.FML.TameMore.Tip: Should the manager designate wild animals to be tamed?
LanguageData.FML.ListEntryTooltip:
{0}s:
{1}/{5} adult females
{2}/{6} adult males
{3}/{7} juvenile females
{4}/{8} juvenile males
LanguageData.FML.SendToSlaughterArea.Tip: Restrict animals designated for slaughtering to a specific area
LanguageData.FML.SendToMilkingArea: Restrict animals ready to be milked
LanguageData.FML.SendToMilkingArea.Tip: Restrict animals with milk fullness above 94% to a specific area.
LanguageData.FML.SendToShearingArea: Restrict animals ready to be sheared
LanguageData.FML.SendToShearingArea.Tip: Restrict animals with shearing fullness above 94% to a specific area
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.DisabledBecauseSlaughterExc: Disabled because excess livestock is not being butchered.
LanguageData.FML.SendToTrainingArea.Tip: Restrict animals designated for training to a specific area.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.DisabledBecauseNoTrainingSe: Disabled because no training target is set.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.CannotTrainTooSmall: {0} are too small to train this.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.DisabledBecauseRoamingAnima: {0} cannot be restricted to an area because they are a roaming animal. Try penning them in an enclosure instead.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.MasterDefault.Tip: Assign animals to a specific master, or to groups of colonists. May overwrite user settings when enabled.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.RespectBonds.Tip: If enabled, always assigns animals that have bonded with a colonist to that colonist. If disabled, bonds are ignored.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.RespectBonds.DisabledBecaus: Disabled because master is set to a specific pawn, or set manually.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.FollowTip: Set master follow settings, will overwrite user settings when enabled. If disabled, follow settings can be assigned manually.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.FollowDrafted.Tip: Should animals follow their assigned masters when the master is drafted?
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.FollowFieldwork.Tip: Should animals follow their assigned masters when the master is doing field work (e.g., hunting)?
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.FollowTraining.Tip: Make animals marked for training try to follow their trainer.
LanguageData.FM.Livestock.MasterTraining.Tip: Assign animals marked for training to a specific master (trainer), or to all trainers. May overwrite user settings when enabled.
